snippet: In a questionnaire being distributed to bishops in advance of their synod next fall, Pope Francis is asking Catholics for their thoughts and opinions on contentious social issues.
abstract: Pope Francis is asking world's one billion Catholics for their opinions on contentious social issues via questionnaire that is being distributed to bishops in advance of their fall 2014 synod meeting; some analysts hold that style and content of questionnaire represent deliberate effort by Francis to engage ordinary Catholics.
lead_paragraph: In a questionnaire being distributed to bishops in advance of their synod next fall, Pope Francis is asking Catholics for their thoughts and opinions on contentious social issues.

headline.main: With Survey, Vatican Seeks Laity Comment on Family Issues
headline.print_headline: With Survey, Vatican Seeks Laity Comment on Family Issues
